name: RPS play
storyline: We will find the best RPS player in the world !
summary:
Rock paper, scissors we thought we knew well. 
What is your usual odds? 
Did you know that Rock, Paper, Scissors also has a strategy? 
Here is the stage. 
Challenge your rock, paper, scissors skills with others! 
Enjoy 1v1 matches and mini tournaments with 4 players to your heart's content!
